items.sentence: Do you think it\'s difficult to speak French?
Do you think it\'s safe to go into this cave?
Do you think that I\'m not trying my hardest?
My mother bought two bottles of orange juice.
Tom is scheduled to come to Boston next week.
I began to play clarinet when I was thirteen.
I bought this guitar for just thirty dollars.
I can assure you there is no need to do that.
I can hear Tom playing guitar in his bedroom.
I can only speak French and a little English.
I started working for this company last year.
I take a walk every day except when it rains.
I think Tom came to Boston when he was young.
I think you have to look for a part-time job.
Tom spoke very eloquently at Mary\'s funeral.
I don\'t understand why Tom brought you here.
I don\'t usually eat the same thing Tom does.
I don\'t want the same thing to happen to us.
I don\'t want to know what you did yesterday.
Tom eats asparagus, but his brother doesn\'t.
I\'m pretty sure Tom isn\'t going to do that.
I\'ve been told that Tom can\'t speak French.
I\'ve got a job and I don\'t want to lose it.
That doesn\'t mean you shouldn\'t be careful.
There are more girls than boys in our school.
There is a small garden in front of my house.
There was a tower on the top of the mountain.
Let\'s eat the ice cream now before it melts.
Tom finished his homework, so he went to bed.
Tom finished the work without any difficulty.
Tom forgot to buy what Mary asked him to buy.
Tom forgot to tell Mary that John had called.
Tom found an empty pill bottle under the bed.
Tom found it easy to speak English with Mary.
She spends way too much time surfing the web.
She tried to comfort him, but he kept crying.
She was ready to give him back all his money.
She went to the train station to see him off.
Since I had a cold, I was absent from school.
He was robbed when coming home late at night.
He was very naughty when he was a little boy.
He wore a mask so no one would recognize him.
His cousin, whose name I forget, was a nurse.
I\'m not sure whether to stay home or go out.
I\'m not used to staying up so late at night.
I\'m not yet accustomed to this cold weather.
I\'m pretty sure Tom did what he said he did.
I didn\'t think Tom would want to go with us.
I didn\'t think our team was really this bad.
I didn\'t want to do this in the first place.
